tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gaming_accessories_warranty (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accessory_name VARCHAR(255),
  warranty_start_date DATE,
  warranty_end_date DATE,
  service_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE service_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (accessory_id) REFERENCES warranty_information(id)
);

CREATE TABLE services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    technician_name TEXT,
    service_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (accessory_id) REFERENCES accessories(accessory_id)
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_claim (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_type TEXT,
    details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (accessory_id) REFERENCES accessories(accessory_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Warranty (
	warranty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	accessory_id INT,
	manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Accessory (
	accessory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	category VARCHAR(50),
	price DECIMAL(10, 2),
	manufacturer VARCHAR(50)
);
